pkgmetadata.longdescription: Simulation of Graphical Correlation Matrices // Simulation of correlation matrices possibly constrained by a given undirected or acyclic directed graph. In particular, the package provides functions that implement the simulation methods described in Crdoba et al. (2018) doi:10.1007/978-3-030-03493-1_13 and Crdoba et al. (2020) doi:10.1016/j.ijar.2020.07.007.
